ctu_text: pdf"}, {"name": "Dependent", "definition": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": " The dependent of manual scavengers is one who is a member of their family or is dependent on them. Each individual manual scavenger and his/her spouse or children who are the age 18 years and above, who are not employed will be provided rehabilitation benefits (skilling and extension of a loan facility). "}]}], "source": "https://socialjustice. gov.

ctu_text: nic. in/en/content/eligibility-criteria/manual-scavengers"}, {"name": "Hazardous Cleaning of Sewer/ Septic Tank", "definition": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "hazardous cleaning\u201d by an employee, in relation to a sewer or septic tank, means manual cleaning by such employee without the employer fulfilling his obligations to provide protective gear (as defined in MS Rule, 2013) and other cleaning devices and ensuring observance of safety precautions, as may be prescribed or provided in any other law, for the time being in force or rules made thereunder;"}]}], "source": "https://socialjustice. gov. in/writereaddata/UploadFile/Guidelines_SRMS_2021_22.

ctu_text: "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Step 06:", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "After acceptance of the terms and conditions of the sanction and execution of the loan agreement/other documents, funds are released to the SCAs/RRBs/Nationalised Bank for onward disbursement to the beneficiaries. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The release of funds is being made by NSKFDC on receipt of demand from the SCAs/RRBs/Nationalised Banks after considering all the parameters of release as per the Lending Policies & Guidelines (LPG) of NSKFDC. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Application for Skill Development - ", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"bold": true, "text": ""}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment, Govt. of India is implementing Pradhan Mantri Dakshta Aur Kushalta Sampann Hitgarhi (PM-DAKSH) Scheme across the country from the financial year 2020-21 through its Apex Corporations.
caption: Poster 3/5 – Procedure (numbers verified)

ctu_text: "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Under the PM-DAKSH Yojana, Skill Development Training is provided to the candidates belonging to SCs, OBCs, EBCs, DNTs, and Sanitation workers including waste pickers for improving all-around competency & adeptness. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}]}], "schemeDefinitions": [{"name": "Manual Scavengers", "definition": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "A person engaged or employed by an individual or a local authority or an agency or a contractor, for manually cleaning, carrying, disposing of, or otherwise handling in any manner, human excreta in an insanitary latrine or in an open drain or pit into which the human excreta from the insanitary latrines is disposed of, or on railway track or in such other spaces or premises, as the Central Government or a State Government may notify, before the excreta fully decomposes in such a manner as may be prescribed, and the expression \u2018\u2019Manual Scavenging\u201d shall be construed accordingly. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "a) \u201cengaged or employed\u2019\u2019 means being engaged or employed on a regular or contract basis;"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "b) a person engaged or employed to clean excreta with the help of such devices and using such protective gear, as the Central Government may notify on this behalf, shall not be deemed to be a \u2018manual scavenger\u2019. "}]}], "source": "https://nskfdc.
